Currently, new residents can only be added by the building manager. Please contact your building manager.

This app is created as Capstone project for Udacity Android Nanodegree program. This app demonstrates usage of: 
 1. Third party library integration 
 2. Google services (Firebase Auth, Realtime DB, Storage, Ads) 
 3. Read network data (Firebase) 
 4. Data persistence (with offline Firebase and Room) 
 5. App widget 
 6. Notifications 
 7. Material design
Use an email ID that is associated with your management
Use email ID that you provided to the management
